overview: This movie is set in the Karoo town of Loxton.  A young mother and daughter and is shocked to discover that the local school will shortly be closing due to financial difficulty.  The townsfolk need to raise half a million Rand. They decides to hold a music concert to raise the money, and sets about recruiting artists to help.  However her reclusive neighbour whom she has had a tiff with turns out to have a few surprises ... which may or may not help her greatly...
title: Jakhalsdans
